name: Ya llegó Miguelito
description:
You play as Miguelito, a kid with the undying dream of becoming a true goose.

Help him traverse the wonderfully chaotic world of Gansotopia, a metropoli of fascist geese that can and will murder you as soon as they discover your human identity.

Unfortunately, Miguelito has a terrible allergy of geese! So try and keep a safe distance from them before you sneeze away your mask and uncover your hideous human face. Disgusting!

Game made for the Global Game Jam 2022.
